message.name: ERR_AN_OPEN_STATUS_FE_CASE_EXIST
message.locale: An "Open" status Foreign Engagement Case already exists for this Person/Prospect Person for the selected Country.

message.name: ERR_RECEIVED_DATE_CANNOT_BE_IN_FUTURE
message.locale: 'Received Date' must not be a future date.

message.name: ERR_START_DATE_MUSTNOT_BE_ENTERED_EARLIER_THAN_RECIEVED_DATE
message.locale: 'Start Date' must not be earlier than ‘Received Date’.

message.name: ERR_FOREIGN_OFFICE_ENTERED_BESS_CANNOT_BE_SELECTED
message.locale: If 'Foreign Office' is entered then 'BESS' must not be entered.

message.name: ERR_YOU_CANNOT_MODIFY_THIS_RECORD
message.locale: You cannot modify this record as it has been deleted.

message.name: ERR_YOU_CANNOT_DELETE_THIS_RECORD_ALREADY_DELETED
message.locale: This record has already been deleted.

message.name: ERR_YOU_CANNOT_DELETE_THIS_RECORD_SINCE_COMPLETED
message.locale: You cannot delete this record as it has been Completed.

message.name: ERR_RECORD_CANNOT_BE_DELETED_SINCE_AN_ACTIVE_LIAISON
message.locale: The record must be unlinked from the Active Liaison prior to deletion.

message.name: ERR_RECORD_CANNOT_BE_DELETED_SINCE_AN_ACTIVE_LIAISON_OR_ACTIVE_FA_EXIST
message.locale: This record cannot be deleted as it is associated to an Active Foreign Liaison or Foreign Application.

message.name: ERR_COUNTRY_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED_SINCE_ACTIVE_LIAISON_OR_ACTIVE_FA_EXIST
message.locale: The 'Country' cannot be modified unless the Record Status of Foreign Applications and Foreign Liaisons is 'Canceled'.

message.name: ERR_FRGN_LIASN_DATE_CANNOT_BE_IN_FUTURE
message.locale: The 'Date' entered must not be in the future.

message.name: ERR_FRGN_LIASN_CHECKLIST_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: At least one information type must be selected from the checklist.

message.name: ERR_FRGN_LIASN_DESCRIPTION_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: If 'Other' is selected then a 'Description' must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FRGN_LIASN_OTHER_MUST_BE_SELECTED
message.locale: If a 'Description' is entered then 'Other' must be selected.

message.name: ERR_FRGN_IDENTIFIER_DOES_NOT_MATCH
message.locale: The Foreign Identifier value entered for the Liaison and its associated Foreign Application(s) does not match.

message.name: ERR_FRGN_LIASN_RECORD_ALREADY_DELETED
message.locale: This record has already been deleted.

message.name: ERR_FRGN_LIASN_RECORD_CANNOT_BE_DELETED
message.locale: The record must be unlinked from the Active Liaison prior to deletion.

message.name: ERR_FRGN_LIASN_BESS_CANNOT_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: If 'Direction' is Outgoing then 'BESS' cannot be entered.

message.name: ERR_FRGN_LIASN_DATE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: 'Date' must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FRGN_LIASN_DIRECTION_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: 'Direction' must be entered.

message.name: INF_FRGN_LIASN_HIST_UPDATED_BY_TEXT
message.locale: %1s on %2z

message.name: ERR_FILE_LOCATION_FILE_REFERENCE_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: File Location and File Reference must be specified.

message.name: ERR_INTERIM_CHK_BOX_SELECTED_SPECIFY_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: If interim check box 'Other' is selected then 'Specify' must be completed.

message.name: ERR_INTERIM_CHK_BOX_SELECTED_BESS_CANNOT_BE_SELECTED
message.locale: If ‘Interim’ is selected then 'BESS' must not be selected.

message.name: ERR_CLIENT_MUST_BE_SELECTED
message.locale: ‘Client Consent Received’ must be selected when the ‘Application Type’ is ‘Interim’ and ‘Country’ is ‘United States’.

message.name: ERR_CLICK_NEXT_TO_LINK_FA
message.locale: When 'Foreign Benefit Application or Foreign Benefit Application-Additional Documents' is selected as the document type, 'Next' must be selected to establish the link to the Foreign Application entered in the system.

message.name: ERR_SELECT_FA_TO_LINK
message.locale: When Foreign Application or Foreign Application-Additional Documents is selected as the document type, the appropriate checkbox must be selected to link it to the Foreign Application entered in the system.

message.name: ERR_DESCRIPTION_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: 'Description' must be entered.

message.name: ERR_SUFFICIENT_PRIVILEGE_OUTGOING_LIAISON
message.locale: You do not have the sufficient privilege to create outgoing liaison.
